about_the_game:
Treasure Royale is a fast paced treasure hunt party game that transports the players to a dynamic island arena filled with action and treasure.

Use different skills and tactics to fight for precious gems while trying to find one of the treasure chests hidden in the island.

Play online with random players or fight against your friends.


Swing your shovel to drop the gems of you enemies.
Steal all of the gems to eliminate others.


Use your shovel as a ranged weapon to dig and throw sand.


Hidden treasures appear when half of the players are eliminated. Possible location of the treasure chest can be seen on the minimap.
Be the one to uncover the treasure chest and hold it for more than 10 seconds to be the winner but be careful, you will drop the treasure chest if anyone hits you.

Other Gameplay Features

Cursed Statues: Use the statues around the island and use your gems to create natural distasters in the island.

Maps: Choose between Tropical Island or Swamp Island with different island hazards and themes.

Game Modes (Upcoming):
  • Classic: Steal gems, uncover the hidden treasure.
  • Sumo: Stay inside the ring.
  • Holy Treasure: Hunt for the precious treasure chest.
